 Email: info@gcc.edu.ph
 
 Website: www.gcc.edu.ph

All colleges are committed to the pursuit of academic excellence and the integration of biblical principles that will produce coveted global godly leaders. 



 Grace Christian College offers 5 degree programs namely:

 			 > Bachelor of Science in Information Technology 

 			 > Bachelor of Science in Electronics and Communications Engineering 

 			 > Bachelor in Secondary Education 

 			 > Bachelor of Science in Accountancy 

 			 > Bachelor of Science in Human Resources and OperationsManagement 



 Last June 2009, another five (5) programs were added: 

 			 > Associate Bachelors in English 

 			 > Bachelor of Science in Biology 

 			 > Bachelor of Science in Psychology 

 			 > Bachelor of Science in Math 

 			 > Bachelor in Elementary Education Major in Teaching Chinese as a Secondary Language/Special Education/Pre-school Education/Elementary Education 



 The curricula of all of the above-mentioned programs incorporate Chinese language teaching specifically aimed at developing superior level language proficiency among the students.
